HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Minimalni iznos dostave u JYSKu je 2,99 €, a cijena dostave povećava se razmjerno povećanju veličine artikala i udaljenosti adrese dostave. Iznos dostave moguće je provjeriti u svakom trenutku u košarici.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava na većinu otoka obavlja se jednom tjedno tijekom zimskog vremena, odnosno dvaput tijekom ljetnog. Ne vrši se dostava na sljedeće otoke: Lastovo, Iž, Prvić, Šipan, Koločep, Zlarin, Lopud, Silba, Vrgada, Krapanj, Molat, Ist, Susak, Drvenik Veli, Olib, Kaprije, Žirje, Ilovik, Rava, Unije, Premuda, Drvenik Mali, Sestrunj, Zverinac, Rivanj, Biševo, Ošljak, Vele Srakane, Kornat, Male Srakane, Sveti Andrija.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Minimalni iznos dostave u JYSKu je 2,99 €, a cijena dostave povećava se razmjerno povećanju veličine artikala i udaljenosti adrese dostave. Iznos dostave moguće je provjeriti u svakom trenutku u košarici.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava na većinu otoka obavlja se jednom tjedno tijekom zimskog vremena, odnosno dvaput tijekom ljetnog. Ne vrši se dostava na sljedeće otoke: Lastovo, Iž, Prvić, Šipan, Koločep, Zlarin, Lopud, Silba, Vrgada, Krapanj, Molat, Ist, Susak, Drvenik Veli, Olib, Kaprije, Žirje, Ilovik, Rava, Unije, Premuda, Drvenik Mali, Sestrunj, Zverinac, Rivanj, Biševo, Ošljak, Vele Srakane, Kornat, Male Srakane, Sveti Andrija.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: Click & Collect: besplatno. Dostava u trgovinu: besplatno za narudžbe od 59,00 € ili više.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: JYSK.hr offers home delivery for small and bulky items, as well as two types of in-store pickup: 'Click & Collect' and 'Delivery to Store'. Parcel shop and locker delivery are not available. DELIVERY PROVIDERS: The specific delivery companies are not named on the website. PRICING: Home delivery starts at €2.99 and varies based on item size and delivery distance. 'Click & Collect' is free. 'Delivery to Store' is free for orders of €59 or more. A cash on delivery (COD) surcharge of €2.65 applies to home deliveries. DELIVERY TIMES: Small items are delivered in 4-6 working days, while bulky items take 5-14 working days. 'Click & Collect' orders are ready for pickup within 30 minutes. 'Delivery to Store' takes 5-10 working days. RESTRICTIONS: Delivery is available only within Croatia. There is a specific list of islands to which delivery is not possible. Special delivery conditions apply to the old town of Rovinj. NOTABLE FEATURES: The 'Click & Collect' service is exceptionally fast. The company clearly distinguishes delivery terms for small vs. bulky items and provides a detailed list of islands excluded from delivery. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is comprehensive and clearly laid out on the 'Uvjeti prodaje i dostave' page. The main omission is the lack of names for their delivery partners. Pricing structure is explained, but final costs are only calculated in the cart. Island delivery rules are very specific and helpful.
